channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping abandoned rubbish, 12th August
item.description:
Rubbish and electrical items dumped in parking lot of South Hill Woods park.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tootswood Road, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paint dumpted in Public Manhole everyday, 12th August
item.description:
Location: • Osborne Mansions, Luxborough Street, London W1U 5BT Issue: • Daily dumping of excess white paint into public manhole outside Osborne Mansions. • Carried out by builders (sub-contractors) working for Notting Hill Genesis Housing Association. • Manhole cover now visibly covered in paint. • Likely contamination of public drainage system. Impact: • Possible breach of Environmental Protection Act 1990 and Water Resources Act 1991. • Damages the appearance and environmental quality of this residential street. Request: • Urgent inspection of site. • Immediate instruction to stop disposal into manhole. • Enforcement action to prevent recurrence. Confidentiality: • Reporting anonymously. • Absolute confidentiality requested — my identity must not be disclosed under any circumstances.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chiltern Street, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Job no 8004958, 12th August
item.description:

item.title: Tree roots, 12th August
item.description:

item.title: 3x manhole covers outside H&M, 12th August
item.description:
3x manhole covers outside H&M have been fitted in the wrong order, breaking the pattern of coloured stones which the council has presumably designed very carefully to be an attractive feature at this location - could the 3 manhole covers be rearranged please so the pattern is correct ?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Regent Street, Mayfair, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 1x manhole cover outside Rymans, 12th August
item.description:
1x manhole cover outside Rymans is raised higher than the others and higher than the pavement level - is possible trip hazard. Apologies could not find a manhole cover option to report this so reported it under pavement damage, although it is not damaged as such.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Hanover Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, London
